natural_language: Quel est le nom et l'adresse IP de tous les postes ?
tanium_question: Get Computer Name, IP Address from all machines
notes: Core sensors: Computer Name, IP Address

natural_language: Liste des machines Windows 10 encore en ligne
tanium_question: Get Computer Name, Last Seen, IP Address from all machines where OS Platform contains "Windows 10"
notes: Uses OS Platform sensor; 'Last Seen' sensor may be named differently in some environments

natural_language: Quels sont les agents Tanium et leurs versions ?
tanium_question: Get Tanium Client Version from all machines

natural_language: Quels postes ont plus de 500 Go d'espace disque libre sur C: ?
tanium_question: Get Free Space (C:) from all machines where Free Space (C:) > 500 GB
notes: Sensor Free Space (C:) returns size; units depend on sensor config

natural_language: Machines avec antivirus installé et nom du produit
tanium_question: Get Antivirus Product, Antivirus Version from all machines
notes: Antivirus sensors depend on endpoint telemetry integration

natural_language: Quels postes ont un BIOS/UEFI plus ancien que version X.Y.Z ?
tanium_question: Get BIOS Version from all machines where BIOS Version < "X.Y.Z"
notes: String comparison may require normalization; test in lab

natural_language: Liste des adresses MAC et VLAN des adaptateurs réseau
tanium_question: Get Network Adapter MAC, Adapter Name from all machines
notes: Adapter VLAN may not be available as a core sensor

natural_language: Quelle est la dernière date de démarrage (uptime) par hôte ?
tanium_question: Get Uptime, Last Boot Time from all machines
notes: Uptime/Last Boot Time sensors are commonly available

natural_language: Quels processus sont en cours sur chaque machine ?
tanium_question: Get Running Processes from all machines
notes: Running Processes sensor; may return large payloads

natural_language: Processus qui utilisent plus de 80 % CPU
tanium_question: Get Process Name, PID, CPU Usage from all machines where CPU Usage > 80
notes: CPU Usage per process sensor required

natural_language: Processus enfant de svchost.exe exécutés sur les postes
tanium_question: Get Process Name, Parent Process Name, Command Line from all machines where Parent Process Name = "svchost.exe"
notes: Parent Process Name sensor must be available

natural_language: Y a-t-il un binaire nommé rundll32.exe lancé depuis %temp% ?
tanium_question: Get Process Name, Command Line from all machines where Process Name = "rundll32.exe" and Command Line contains "%temp%"
notes: Command Line sensor search; be careful with environment variables expansion

natural_language: Quels processus ont des handles réseau ouverts (connectés) ?
tanium_question: Get Process Name, PID, Remote Address, Remote Port from all machines where Remote Address exists

natural_language: Quel utilisateur a lancé tel processus sur telle machine ?
tanium_question: Get Process Name, PID, User Name from machines with Computer Name = "HOST123"

natural_language: Est-ce que C:\Windows\Temp\malware.exe existe ?
tanium_question: Get File Exists "C:\Windows\Temp\malware.exe" from all machines

natural_language: Hash MD5 de C:\Windows\System32\powershell.exe sur tous les hôtes
tanium_question: Get File Hash (MD5) of "C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe" from all machines
notes: Use correct path for PowerShell; sensor name may vary (File Hash)

natural_language: Rechercher tous les *.pst sur une machine spécifique et renvoyer chemin complet
tanium_question: Get File Name, File Path from machines with Computer Name = "HOST123" where File Name matches "*.pst"
notes: File search sensors can be resource intensive

natural_language: Quels fichiers modifiés au cours des dernières 24 heures dans C:\Users ?
tanium_question: Get File Name, File Path, Last Modified Time from all machines where Parent Path = "C:\Users" and Last Modified Time >= now - 24h
notes: Time arithmetic depends on sensor capabilities

natural_language: Taille du fichier / checksum pour un exécutable suspect
tanium_question: Get File Size, SHA256 of "C:\Temp\suspicious.exe" from all machines

natural_language: Fichiers exécutables sans signature numérique
tanium_question: Get File Name, File Path, Digital Signature Status from all machines where Digital Signature Status = "Unsigned"
notes: Digital signature sensor availability varies by environment

natural_language: Service Windows 'Spooler' : état et type de démarrage
tanium_question: Get Service Name, Service State, Startup Type from all machines where Service Name = "Spooler"

natural_language: Tâches planifiées qui lancent cmd.exe
tanium_question: Get Scheduled Task Name, Action, Next Run Time from all machines where Action contains "cmd.exe"
notes: Scheduled Task sensors exist but names differ

natural_language: Existe-t-il une clé de registre HKLM\Software\Malicious ?
tanium_question: Get Registry Key Exists "HKLM\\Software\\Malicious" from all machines

natural_language: Valeur de registre pour la clé d'autostart
tanium_question: Get Registry Value "HKLM\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run" from all machines

natural_language: Extensions de services installées par l'utilisateur
tanium_question: Get Installed Services, Service Path from all machines where Install Account = "User"
notes: Install Account filter may not be available on all sensors

natural_language: Quelles machines écoutent sur le port 3389 ?
tanium_question: Get Listening Ports, Process Name from all machines where Listening Ports contains 3389

natural_language: Connexions réseau sortantes vers IPs externes
tanium_question: Get Remote Address, Remote Port, Process Name from all machines where Remote Address not in private ranges
notes: Filtering for private ranges requires CIDR logic; replace with explicit CIDRs if needed

natural_language: Quels hôtes ont des résolutions DNS pour 'example.com' récemment ?
tanium_question: Get DNS Queries from all machines where DNS Query contains "example.com" and Timestamp >= now - 1d

natural_language: Statistiques bytes envoyés par machine la dernière heure
tanium_question: Get Network Bytes Sent, Network Bytes Received from all machines where Timestamp >= now - 1h

natural_language: Interfaces réseau désactivées / activées
tanium_question: Get Network Adapter Status, Adapter Name from all machines

natural_language: Machines qui manquent la mise à jour KB123456
tanium_question: Get Installed Windows Updates from all machines where Updates does not contain "KB123456"

natural_language: Liste des logiciels avec versions (pour corrélation CVE)
tanium_question: Get Installed Applications, Version from all machines

natural_language: Quel est le statut du Windows Update agent ?
tanium_question: Get Windows Update Agent Version, Update Client State from all machines

natural_language: Machines vulnérables selon le scanner (score CVE > 7.0)
tanium_question: Get Vulnerability ID, CVSS Score, Affected Hosts from vulnerability module where CVSS Score > 7.0

natural_language: Qui est connecté actuellement sur la machine HOST123 ?
tanium_question: Get Logged On Users from machines with Computer Name = "HOST123"

natural_language: Comptes locaux membres du groupe Administrators
tanium_question: Get Local Administrator Accounts from all machines

natural_language: Dernière connexion interactive par utilisateur
tanium_question: Get Last Interactive Logon, User Name from all machines

natural_language: Comptes avec mot de passe expiré
tanium_question: Get Account Name, Password Expiration Date from all machines where Password Expiration Date <= now

natural_language: Rechercher Event ID 4625 dans les 24 dernières heures
tanium_question: Get Event Log (Security) where Event ID = 4625 and Time Generated >= now - 24h from all machines
notes: Event log query syntax may vary; use 'Event Log (Security)' sensor

natural_language: Evénements application contenant 'crash' au cours de la journée écoulée
tanium_question: Get Event Log (Application) where Message contains "crash" and Time Generated >= now - 1d from all machines

natural_language: Exporter PCAP pour l'interface réseau sur hôtes ciblés
tanium_question: Action: Deploy package "Start Packet Capture" to machines with Computer Group = "InvestigateGroup"
notes: Actions require packages and proper permissions
